overview: A wry tale of how one women’s sensuality is confined by a garden fence.  A woman breaks free of her monotonous daily routine tending to her husband by escaping into her garden; its sensual pleasures evident in her minutely-observed expressions of delight. The garden’s sights and sounds offer welcome distraction as do the attentions of her neighbour.  This winsome, dialogue-free film celebrates the often-overlooked sensuality of older women.
title: Fumbling Towards Ecstasy
